name: Coal The Cummins Hat - Unisex
description: The cold-weather warmth of a quilted sweater, but for your head.Solid colours are 100% cotton twill, plaids are 65% polyester 33% rayon 2% elastane.Fold-down fleece earflaps up the coziness.Mid-crown fit adds space between your head and top of the hat.

Fabric content: Fabrics vary; see product descriptionFabrics vary; see product description
